pull.title: build: Fix configure report about qr
pull.body:
On master (b7bc9b8330096d1f4f1fa563b855b88da425226e):
```
$ apt list libqrencode-dev
Listing... Done
libqrencode-dev/bionic 3.4.4-1build1 amd64
$ ./configure | grep -i qr
checking for QR... no
checking whether to build GUI with support for QR codes... no
    with qr     = auto
```

With this PR:
```
$ apt list libqrencode-dev
Listing... Done
libqrencode-dev/bionic 3.4.4-1build1 amd64
$ ./configure | grep -i qr
checking for QR... no
checking whether to build GUI with support for QR codes... no
    with qr     = no
```
